name: Tino Chess Club
officers:
Prarthan Ghosh, pghosh700, President, set meeting agendas and manage the club roster
Naman Yadav, nyadav422, Vice President, assist the President and help create slideshows
Yash Srivastava, Secretary, submit meeting minutes and manage tournaments
Sarbesh Sankar, ssankar506, Treasurer, oversee club purchases and secure applicable grants
Ayush Pathare, apathare439, Public Relations, create social media posts and draft monthly newsletters
adjustment_policy: If any officer is unable to fulfill their duty, their duties be taken on by the President. If the President is unable to execute their duties, the Vice President will take them on.
new_officer_application: Current officers who will be at CHS in the next school year will stay, barring certain circumstances, as an officer. Around April, the Tino Chess Club will start an officer application process to replace officers who will not be at CHS in the next school year. Officer positions for the next school year will be decided internally by the officer team. Applicants will not apply for a specific position.
